paper_abstract: In this article, a hybrid model is introduced in which our previous fuzzy inference approach is used for extracting the behavior of receiving antenna and predicting the induced current and mutual coupling effects with an excellent accuracy and then it is combined with Volterra series model to analyze nonlinearly loaded finite antenna array. As it is expected, the computation time of the resulted hybrid model is much faster than the accurate ones, without loss of accuracy. (C) 2009 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Int J RF and Microwave CAE 19: 512-518, 2009.
paper_title: A Hybrid Model in Analyzing Nonlinearly Loaded Dipole Antenna and Finite Antenna Array in the Frequency Domain
